definition[0]: used to refer to something that belongs to or is connected with people that have already been mentioned
example[0]: When our washing machine broke, our neighbours let us use theirs.
example[1]: Our house is number 25, and theirs is just opposite.
example[2]: We compared scores and found that theirs were higher than ours.
example[3]: They shared the prize money with a friend of theirs.
definition[1]: used when talking about someone who may be male or female, to avoid saying ‘his or hers’
example[4]: Everyone wants what is theirs by right.
